Name: Fifty.ServerChatCommands [FSCC]
Description:
Part of FSU [ Fifty Server Utilities ]
Implements server-side chat command functionality. Any mods can use this to register chat commands.

Dependencies:
  - Fifty.ServerUtilities

ConVars.Name: FSCC_PREFIX
ConVars.HelpString: The prefix used for commands. Should only be one character.

ConVars.Name: FSCC_OWNER
ConVars.HelpString: The contact owner of the owner ( discord, ... ). gets printed by the owner command.

ConVars.Name: FSCC_RULES
ConVars.HelpString: A list of rules. These get printed by the rules command.

ConVars.Name: FSCC_DISCORD
ConVars.HelpString: A link to discord. Gets printed by the discord command.

ConVars.Name: FSCC_MODE_HIDE_MESSAGES_GLOBAL
ConVars.HelpString: Whether to hide the player messages which are identified as possible commands.

ConVars.Name: FSCC_MODE_SECURE
ConVars.HelpString: Whether to empty the message struct. This may break other chat command mods.
